title: Darksiders II Deathinitive Edition
notes: Crashes on first run after then menus. Second run it entered the game and played perfectly

title: Darksiders II Deathinitive Edition
notes: Sound stutters and after selecting the display settings it freezes while the game tries to load.

title: Darksiders II Deathinitive Edition
notes:
Runs with option "PROTON_NO_ESYNC":"1"
Frozen enemies sometimes become invisible for a short duration.

title: Darksiders II Deathinitive Edition
notes:
Runs only when using "PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1  %command%" in launch options (without brackets). 
Window Mode sometimes appears black when starting, swichting to a different virtual desktop and backes solves this. 
Created visual artifacts on even Surfaces once, fixed by changing graphic settings.
Despite adding %command% PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 to launch options in steam - it refused to proceed past the first loading screen.
title: Darksiders II Deathinitive Edition

notes: Crashes on first run, at the end of cinematic, then runs ok.VSync is broken and performance is subpar but still 60+ fps. No need for ESYNC=0, just raise max fd numbers as explained on steam play wiki...
title: Darksiders II Deathinitive Edition

notes: Game crashes after intro. Also crashes if you try to skip intro.
title: Darksiders II Deathinitive Edition

notes: Played the intro. Performance is great. No tweaks required to get the game running. No changes to the game settings were made. It crashes after playing video sequences, but it can be restarted and continued from where it crashed.
title: Darksiders II Deathinitive Edition

notes: Almost playable. Game runs well but crashes after some cinematics or after loading a save.
title: Darksiders II Deathinitive Edition

notes: Runs as expected with no artifacts of note
